extensionAttribute.description:
Written by Neil Martin - 2018-12-01
This Extension Attribute returns the date installed definitions were released. See https://support.eset.com/kb85/ for the latest version released.
Returns no value if ESET Antivirus is not installed.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/bash
esets_daemon="/Applications/ESET Endpoint Antivirus.app/Contents/MacOS/esets_daemon"
if [[ -e "$esets_daemon" ]]; then esetsigdate=$("$esets_daemon" --status | grep AVSigsDate | cut -d "=" -f 2 | sed -e 's/T/ /g') echo "<result>$esetsigdate</result>" exit 0 else echo "<result>""</result>" fi
exit 0
